name: EndlessRunner_KaiyuJin
description:
KaiyuJin_217733338

A endless runner game.

The speed will increase according to the coins you get.

The GreenGem will help you charge you bar. 

When the bar is full, push Q get a shield, and push W  reduces speed.

When you got 30 coins, you win!

When you hit the bomb without a shield, you lose.
